mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderlist ( user_id, order_date, total_price, delivery_status, delivery_request, payment_method, receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_address, used_point, coupon_discount, payment_status ) VALUES ( #{userId}, NOW(), #{totalPrice}, #{deliveryStatus}, #{deliveryRequest}, #{paymentMethod}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{receiverAddress}, #{usedPoint}, #{couponDiscount}, #{paymentStatus} )
